"""
PROCESS:


SCAN QUEUE FILES IN SYSCHECK FOLDER (IN OSSEC)
FOR EACH QUEUE FILE
	CHECK OUR LOCAL DB (local_data.json file) FOR LAST ENTRY
	SCAN FILE LINE BY LINE
	SEND MD5 TO VT
	PROCESS RESULT 
		IF POSSITIVE 
			CREATE LOG (log_vt file)


"""

local_data.json example:

{"agents": {"(jessie72) 192.168.1.72-_syscheck": "None"}}
